entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • OpenAPI XML source generator "slow" #61146
  • Quarantine FormWithParentBindingContextTest.RadioButtonGetsResetAfterSubmittingEnhancedForm #61144
  • Quarantine NavigationManagerUriGetsUpdatedOnEnhancedNavigation_BothServerAndWebAssembly( #61143
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #61142
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #61141
  • Packaging of static assets of razor libraries is different in Githhub Actions from Local Computer #61140
  • Incorrect OpenAPI Schema Generation for Recursive Types #61139
  • API proposal for Declarative Model for Persistent Component and Services State #61138
  • Api proposal for NavLink.ShouldMatch #61137
  • API proposal for CloseColumnOptionsAsync #61135
  • API proposal for NotFound #61133
  • HybridCache: Disabled Local Cache returns InvalidData warning #61132
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot #61130
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #61129

Closed

  • Perf improvement: httpsys-encoded-url #61128
  • API proposal for RowClass #61136
  • Login/Out problem with Entra External ID (example BlazorWebAppEntra-.net9). Login succesful, logout with problem #60941
  • [Blazor] Can't register custom AuthenticationStateProvider when already using EntraID auth. #60848
  • Microsoft.OpenAPI 2.0.0.0 has breaking changes #61123
  • [OpenAPI] error CS0122: 'Type' is inaccessible due to its protection level #61037
    10.0-preview4

PullRequests

Created

  • Harden handling for generic type arguments in source generator #61145
    area-mvc
  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-preview.4.25174.4 #61134
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • Updated to vs 17.13 to align with xcopy-msbuild #60763
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 10.0-preview4
  • Transitive package to provide coherency in dotnet/extensions #61007
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview4
  • Add CurrentLtsTargetFramework only when it's not present #61076
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview4
  • [main] (deps): Bump actions/upload-artifact from 4.6.1 to 4.6.2 #61068
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview4
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `2b6b042` to `c2ceb2b` #61071
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview4
  • Update accessibility check for types in same assembly #61082
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 10.0-preview4

Updated

  • Remove unneeded 'fixed' statements from SocketAddress #61006
    area-networking, reduce-unsafe
  • Fix up handling for non-generic Task and ValueTask #61085
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • [main] (deps): Bump actions/setup-node from 4.2.0 to 4.3.0 #61067
    area-infrastructure
  • Add a new UseKestel API to the WebApplicationFactory #60635
    area-mvc
  • [main] (deps): Update dotnet/arcade requirement to 235443a5c1136571cacdfd40576f263f26bf5b9b #61066
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview4
  • [Blazor] Remove explicit WasmBootConfigFileName from tests #61034
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview4
  • Add `NotFoundPage` to `Router` #60970
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-routing, .NET 10 Planning

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-24
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Extensions: mark open issues as resolved #9258

Merged

  • Extensions: add more open issues #9234

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Implementing sharepoint as a db context #35837
  • Why did switching from nested querying to Include cause EF to repeat a table join? #35836
  • Lazy loader performance issues #35832

Closed

  • provide `libe_sqlite3.so` library for `linux-bionic-arm64` target in NuGet #35838
  • ClientCascade more performant alternative (Source Generator library) #35831
  • Compiled query unable to translate Where with long? #35758
  • Easy way to work with custom nested transactions #35830

PullRequests

Created

  • Make Cosmos tests faster #35841
  • Fix casted collections of enums as primitive collections. #35839
  • Fixed Lazy loader performance issues #35835

Merged

  • Bump Grpc.AspNetCore from 2.67.0 to 2.70.0 #35840
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Updated

  • Add function mapping for Ticks to sqlserver #35465
    community-contribution
  • Fix to #35299 - EF Core InMemory database throws an argument exception on Nullable<>.ToString #35763
  • Translate COALESCE as ISNULL #34171
    community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Assembly.GetEntryAssembly() returns null #28597
  • Version tag info in .csproj is incorrectly detected #28596
  • [ANDROID] - Passing header to Webview #28590
  • iOS ContactProviderExtension Support #28586
    Backlog
  • [.NET 9 WinUI] Unhandled exception when I build MAUI application with enabled AOT #28582
  • CollectionView footer sizing when source is empty #28580
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • CollectionView supports ScrollX, ScrollY and ContentSize property like ScrollView does. #28576
    Backlog

Closed

  • Hot Reload and Live Preview won't work if the configuration is not called Debug #28316
  • Cannot create Android archive when project output path on a different drive #28095
  • TapGestureRecognizer on Parent Layout Triggers TapCommand on Windows but Not on Android #28588
  • Update to 9.0.50 breaks CommunityToolkit.Popup #28581
  • [Android, 9.0 Preview 7] Overriding OnKeyUp in MainActivity does not capture keyboard presses #24557
    Backlog
  • The slider in the "Right to left TableView" page is abnormal in Android and iOS #28156
    Backlog
  • MAUI 9 calling .Clear() on an ObservableCollection bound to a listview causes a nullref #28579
  • Blazor Hybrid Android Throws Exception Not Supported Picture-In-Picture(PIP) #28544
    Backlog
  • Cannot print document in BlazorWebView #28372

PullRequests

Created

  • Add Binding.ConverterCulture #28595
    t/breaking 💥, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr5] [iOS] Back-navigation with swipe-back navigates back twice - fix #28594
  • Fixed Test case failure in PR 28560 #28584
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion, test-flight
  • [Testing] Fix for flaky UITests in CI that occasionally fail - 5 #28583
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Implemented InteractivePopGesture #28577
    area-testing, community ✨

Merged

  • [iOS] Back-navigation with swipe-back navigates back twice - fix #28485
    platform/iOS 🍎, p/0, area-controls-shell, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • [inflight/candidate] [ci] Don't use the short url for install script #28593

  • [ci] Don't use the short url for install script #28591
    area-infrastructure
  • Update Versions.props to sr4.1 #28589
  • [.NET 10] More public APIs related with Entry and Editor, pending TODOs #28467
    t/breaking 💥, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-controls-entry, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • Fix HideSoftInputOnTapped Not Working Net9 #28534
    community ✨, area-keyboard, partner/syncfusion
  • [ci] Update arcade net10.0 #28518
    area-infrastructure, .NET 10.0-preview3

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Double-clicking C# inline hints in order inserts their texts in wrong positions #77777

Closed

  • [EnC] Deleting partial definition that doesn't have an implementation fails assertion #77340

PullRequests

Created

  • Do not call JTF.Run from a bg thread in options initialization #77788
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Set the default namespace for the project and proper folders for documents #77787
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Do not allow System.CommandLine to swallow all unhandled exceptions in LSP server #77786
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Implement support for Semantic Search agent and tool #77784
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Generate Documentation - Add remarks if available #77783
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Address PROTOTYPE comment in ExtensionMethodBodyRewriter #77782
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Disallow complex forms of IndexerName attributes in extensions #77781
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Feedback from analyzer loading change #77780
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Change SVsBrokeredServiceContainer retrieval to not use RoslynServiceExtensions #77775
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Revert "Revert "Stop using the rename dashboard"" #77774
    Needs UX Triage

Merged

  • Fix move to namespace offering for primary constructor #77751
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix integration tests by adding skip for Codelens issue #77758
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Extensions: account for new extensions in function type scenarios #77755
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Fix handling of partial definition deletes #77735
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Enable Server GC for OOP #77739
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main-vs-deps' => 'release/dev17.15' #77779
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'main-vs-deps' #77776
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Rework analyzer assembly loading #77004
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Revert "Stop using the rename dashboard" #77770
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage

Updated

  • Another attempt to move MiscellaneousFilesWorkspace to a bg thread #77768
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'main-vs-deps' #77790
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support ILogger.BeginScope() for LSP logging #77647
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Null-conditional assignment: Add tests from test plan review #77717
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main-vs-deps' => 'release/dev17.15' #77789
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Dictionary expressions: support concrete target types that do not use `[CollectionBuilder]` #77477
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Generate Documentation - Add loading state #77718
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update maintenance-packages dependencies #77267
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow modification of source generated documents #77587
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Reduce likelihood of needing a dual insertion in VS Code #77715
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Make `Implement with Copilot` light up on member name #77769
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/dev17.15' => 'release/dev17.15-vs-deps' #77773
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
  • Fix issue with disappearing newlines after multiline documentation comment #77521
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Razor EA: load from ServiceHubCore #77720
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add LSP handler for custom requests #77444
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Implement name and signature conflict check across extension containers with the same receiver type #77747
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Parse ignored directives #77696
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, Feature - Ignored Directives
  • [release/dev17.12] Update dependencies to ensure coherency #77262
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/dev17.13] Update dependencies to ensure coherency #77570
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Tensor Dimensions Refining #113863
  • State of WASM/WASI support in Net 9 #113858
  • Stack overflow in FileSystemWatcher when running as systemd service #113855
  • Invoking an unmanaged fastcall function pointer under x86 Windows fails at runtime #113851
    Future
  • [cDAC] Improve logging #113844
    10.0.0
  • Deserialization crashes when having required init property in nested class and using source generation mode #113841
  • AltJit hits "Assert failure: reserveUnwindInfo() can only be called before allocMem(), but allocMem() has already been called" #113840
    10.0.0
  • Mono inconsistency in error case when using ExplicitThis when defining constructor #113839
  • JsonObjectCreationHandling.Populate not working with required and init with source generation #113838
  • [browser] NoFingerprint, LazyLoadingTests.LoadLazyAssemblyBeforeItIsNeeded, timeout #113836
    10.0.0
  • [Test Failure] SslStreamDisposeTest.Dispose_ParallelWithHandshake_ThrowsODE on Unix #113833
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed `(consume == 0) || (ComputeAvailableSrcCount(tree) == consume)` during 'Linear scan register alloc' #113832
    10.0.0
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.NetworkInformation.Tests.PingTest.CancelSendPingAsync on OSX #113831
  • JIT: Assertion failed `genTypeSize(op1) == genTypeSize(simdBaseType)` during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #113829
    10.0.0
  • [iOS][MacCatalyst] Invalid SocketOption in `MulticastInterface` on new macOS versions (14.7, 15.2) #113827
  • Test failure: JIT/Directed/tls/TestTLSWithLoadedDlls/TestTLSWithLoadedDlls.cmd #113816
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/Directed/throwbox/filter/filter.dll #113815
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: profiler/elt/slowpatheltenter/slowpatheltenter.cmd #113814
    10.0.0

Closed

  • CORJIT_FLAG_READYTORUN and CORJIT_FLAG_PREJIT #113823
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Expand GT_RETURN condition to GT_JTRUE #65370
    10.0.0
  • Different codegen for `return cond;` vs `if (cond) return true; return false;` #8363
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Caller information atribute for the caller type or reflection info #113848
  • Reduce iteration over regmaskTP in relevant methods #113670
  • PersistedAssemblyBuilder not emitting calling convention for Calli + CallingConventions.HasThis #113626
    10.0.0
  • mTLS handshake not working on Linux from .NET 5.0.15/6.0.x #71825
    Future
  • CreateSubKey(string, RegistryKeyPermissionCheck, RegistrySecurity?) ignores its third argument #113538
    10.0.0
  • PollGC rewrite and TS_CatchAtSafePoint #113807
    10.0.0

Created

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Get rid of the "untriaged" auto-label on Github issues #47844
  • Verify DAC signing works in preview VMR branches #47842
  • SDK ZIP does not include all AppHost packs #47841
  • "dotnet restore" fails if the project path contains a bracket #47832

Closed

  • Comparing symbols using only one set of references can result in false differences due inconsistent compare strings #46834
  • Revise exit codes for `dotnet test` #47550
    10.0.1xx
  • Compile native AOT library for Android in NET 9.0 #47801

PullRequests

Created

    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
